name: Beautying the Beast
description:
A game made for gamedev.js jame 2021.  You run a monster beauty salon and your goal is to give the customers what they want! Draw makeup as close to their vision as possible within the time frame!

Developed by David Grenzowski and Daniel Orellana

Contributing artists: Monika Maniecki and Dan Hood

Special thanks to the content team at Homer for their support and to those that let us work on the game jam!

Uses the image comparison library pixelmatch 
https://github.com/mapbox/pixelmatch
